name: Pixel Parkour (App Assassins)
description:
Pixel Parkour is a 2D platformer game developed in Unity.  The player has to avoid traps and reach the flag to advance to the next level. (Hint: If you don't know where to go on a level, follow the apples). 

Updates:

The game will hopefully receive a content updates every two weeks and minor updates and bug fixes when needed.
